creditline: Gift of Mom, Mary Haldeman Dayton, and her family
description: Large orange square with black rectangle borders on each side; gray and black squares and rectangles at top; white square with grid lines at center bottom of large orange square; silver metal frame
provenance: Mary Haldeman Dayton, Long Lake, Minn. (until d. 2010); estate of Mary Haldeman Dayton (2010; given to MIA)
title: Misuratori
